QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_subobjmappings.id odf_pk, int_subobjmappings.code as code, int_subobjmappings.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, int_subobjmappings.im_id as im_id, int_subobjmappings.external_object_id as external_object_id, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, int_subobjmappings.external_object as external_object, int_subobjmappings.name as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, int_subobjmappings.clarity_object as clarity_object, INT_SUBOBJMAPPINGS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_int_subobject_map.partition_code as partition_code, INT_SUBOBJMAPPINGS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, int_subobjmappings.clarity_object_id as clarity_object_id, int_subobjmappings.direction as direction from int_subobjmappings int_subobjmappings JOIN int_integrationmappings int_integrationmappings ON int_integrationmappings.id=int_subobjmappings.im_id JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=int_subobjmappings.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=int_subobjmappings.last_updated_by JOIN odf_ca_int_subobject_map odf_ca_int_subobject_map ON odf_ca_int_subobject_map.id=int_subobjmappings.id where 1 = 1
